attributes.action: Only Take Transplant Organs with Consent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a Person is willing to have their body used for spare parts then they should carry a card giving their consent. I feel that the world has so many greedy people that humans have become a pest to the environment. The Numbers of People having Organ Transplants can not rise as their is already too many greedy people on earth. We need to share it with the environment as a whole.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
